: : Kup/Rodimus Prime : :

With Azure gone, Kup transformes, and walks to where Windlord and 
Rattrap are.

Kup: So whats the problem with these pods?

After recieving Azure's comm message, Rodimus realizes that they are 
doing something wrong.

Rodimus Prime: Yggdrasil, stop!

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> AzureBlade disembarks and transforms swiftly (if painfully).
>

my 
> way, leave it to me.
